creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of Kenji Nakahashi and in honor of Robert Cozzolino
description: maps and diagrams of the earth; diagram of the solar system in URC; diagram of Milky Way galaxy in LRC; labelled photographic images at left printed in blue, with images of seated couples, tanks, blindfolded men, a baby with a reclining woman, cars, man with gas pump and car
inscription: at left edge, LLC, in blue: 069
title: The Earth 1980
